techs.name: Things To Know
techs.quote: 'A cage, like for a bird or an insect, can't function if it's completely sealed off. You need at least the air to pass through. Without the sun, the flowers wouldn't bloom. Similarly, without new wind and sun constantly entering Gensokyo, the place would simply die off. Closing off Gensokyo means no longer accepting things. Do you really think Gensokyo could survive without visitors bringing in new ideas?' ? Hecatia Lapislazuli
uniques: Military units suffers from -50% Strength before the discovery of Professional Army
-1 Movement for Water units when moving in Ocean tiles before the discovery of Navigation
Be wary of Chimata's nation, Land Of Wealth, she can construct an improvement that will completely take away your Gold tile yields within 3 tiles away of it

techs.name: Scientific Knowledge
techs.quote: The Touhou Project series while being primarily based on the religion known as Shinto it is not unusual to see many functions of the Touhou world to rely on modern science (Gendaikagaku).

techs.name: Education
techs.quote: Thanks for attending Cirno's perfect math class.

techs.name: Calendar
techs.quote: 'Remembering the melancholy of human existence. Even ghosts stray from the path of righteousness.' - Yuyuko Saigyouji.

techs.name: Paid Service
techs.quote: Even Mystia's Izakaya doesn't have this.

techs.name: Authority
techs.quote: 'I'll tell you a secret. My weakness is... nothing.' - Yukari Yakumo.

techs.name: Agriculture
techs.quote: Youkais can't plant, can they? Or can they?

techs.name: Sailing
techs.quote: Apparently, there is no sea in Gensokyo.

techs.name: Fermented Alcohol
techs.quote: She didn't spill a drop of her sake.

techs.name: Iron Working
techs.quote: 'You might be trying to get experience points, but you'll just be wasting time in the end.' - Parsee-chan.

techs.name: State Government
techs.quote: 'Shooting, cutting, stabbing, hitting, killing...It's all useless against me.' - Yukari Yakumo; not only is she not scared of physics, but of logic as well.

techs.name: Professional Army
techs.quote: 'That aura I feel from you... Could you be a wolf spirit? To think that a wolf would be smart enough to rely on a living human...' - Mayumi Joutouguu.

techs.name: Negotiations
techs.quote: 'pls rember that wen u feel scare or frigten never forget ttimes wen u feeled happy. wen day is dark alway rember happy day' - A quote in that will surely make your day.

techs.name: Currency
techs.quote: 'You foul barbarian... How long are you going to believe that you can use violence to hold dominion over objects? Possession of an object can only be controlled by the god of the markets. As long as they possess something, none can escape from the hands of God! The market has been opened! Let us return all things to nothing!' - Chimata Tenkyuu.

techs.name: Hot Spring
techs.quote: In Japan, onsen are hot springs and the bathing facilities, something like you would think of pools.

techs.name: Metal Casting
techs.quote: The Scarlet Devil Mansion is explosive.

techs.name: Gunpowder
techs.quote: Remember, Alice puts gunpowder inside her dolls.

techs.name: Shield Wall
techs.quote: Fujiwara no Mokou is a princess from the Fujiwara Clan.
uniques: [+50]% Strength <vs [Ranged] units> <when defending> <for [Melee] units> <when adjacent to a [Melee] unit>

techs.name: Festivals
techs.quote: 'I've been watching all of you this whole time. You all responded to my 'foregathering ability' without noticing, and came to these feasts. Do you know what this means? It means none of you can defeat me.' - Suika Ibuki.

techs.name: Printing
techs.quote: 'You don't seem related to the incident, so without further ado, allow me to blow you into the next week!' - Aya Shameimaru to Eternity Larva.
uniques: May buy [Mercenary] units with [Gold] for [2] times their normal Production cost

techs.name: Improved Trade
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]
techs.quote: 'The Ability Cards? I don't just 'know' about them. I created them, as a matter of fact!' - Megumu Iizunamaru.

techs.name: Yama's Permission
techs.quote: And so, the gates to magic and divinity was opened.
uniques: Access to Magic and Religion tech tree

techs.name: Navigation
uniques: Enables [Embarked] units to enter ocean tiles
techs.quote: 'Wakasagi' is a fish native in northern Japan, Hime is a suffix that means 'princess.' That would mean, Wakasagihime's name is literally 'fish princess.'

techs.name: Maintained Society
techs.quote: Crow Tengu (karasu-tengu), the 'nimble information corps,' are similar to anthropomorphic crows with a humanoid body structure. Since they're responsible for writing and distributing newspapers, they're the only type of tengu that ventures to the foothills.

techs.name: Mathematics
techs.quote: Teacher Keine will be proud.
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to [Science]

techs.name: Religion
techs.quote: There are three main religions in Gensokyo: Buddhism, Taoism, Shintoism.

techs.name: Research For Magic
techs.quote: 'It ain't magic if it ain't flashy! Danmaku's all about firepower!' - Marisa Kirisame.

techs.name: Rituals
techs.quote: 'Out of the generations of shrine maidens, her sense of danger is the most lacking and she has meager training, yet her power is considerable.' - Hieda no Akyuu, referring to Reimu Hakurei.

techs.name: Religious Doctrine
techs.quote: ''An echo spirit, huh? So all you do is parrot things back?' Marisa once said, urging Kyouko to reply; who then replied with, 'That is all I do, so don't tease me about it.'

techs.name: Simple Alchemy
techs.quote: According to Rinnosuke Morichika, Marisa was inspired to use star-themed magic after a meteor shower viewing party around the year 2001.

techs.name: Forbidden Sorcery
techs.quote: 'Oh well, it doesn't matter if you really are youkai or not. I have the grimoire you're looking for. I am the magician you're looking for. Whether you are youkai or not. YOU ARE MY ENEMIES!' - Alice Margatroid to the Three Fairies of Light.

techs.name: Politics
techs.quote: White Wolf Tengu (hakurou tengu) are the 'mountain's defense force,' responsible for keeping out intruders. They're known as avid players of shogi

techs.name: Compass
techs.quote: There is a ship-sinking youkai in Gensokyo, be careful of her.

techs.name: Physics
techs.quote: Satori is a type of mountain-dwelling youkai in Japanese folklore that is known to live within the mountains of Hida and Mino (today's Gifu Prefecture).

techs.name: Culture Preservation
techs.quote: 'I've been waiting. You've got some guts, challenging me on the night of the full moon.' - Keine Kamishirasawa.

techs.name: Brewing Mastery
techs.quote: In Imperishable Night, Marisa survives looking at the full moon, which should drive normal humans insane. When Alice asks if she's alright, she says that it's alright since she's insane to begin with.

techs.name: Advanced Magic
techs.quote: Sunny Milk mentions that she's looking for a magician with a grimoire that 'shines wonderfully with all the seven colors of the light.'

techs.name: Mysterious Knowledge
techs.quote: Koakuma & Daiyousei's names were created by the community.

techs.name: Shogunate
techs.quote: The shogunate was the hereditary military dictatorship of Japan (1192?1867). Obviously, it doesn't canocally exist in Gensokyo.

techs.name: Law And Order
techs.quote: There is only black and white.

techs.name: Chemistry
techs.quote: Science is Elegant.

techs.name: Divine Punishment
techs.quote: 'Conviction! Conviction! Conviction!' - Eiki Shiki. Of course, she didn't say that in canon.

techs.name: Magical Science
techs.quote: The actual name of Renko and Merry's club is 'The Hifuu Club', not 'Ghostly Field Club'

techs.name: Dark Magic
techs.quote: 'Sonanoka?' - Rumia.
uniques: New [Military] units start with [15] Experience [in all cities]

techs.name: Self-Discovery
techs.quote: 'Bet you'd be stronger if you tore those restrictive clothes.' - Marisa Kirisame, out of context.
uniques: Free Great Person <if no other Civilization has researched this>

techs.name: Law Enforcement
techs.quote: Dansu no chansu ni pankuna ranbu de anta no mausu wa anguri 'nan chi ~yuu fanki' (nan chi ~yuu fanki!)

techs.name: Fertilizer
techs.quote: You're not gonna use animal feces as fertilizer, are you?

techs.name: National Faith
techs.quote: 'Humans haven't changed since my days in the temple. How weak and rash you are!' - Byakuren Hijiri to Reimu Hakurei.

techs.name: Philosophy
techs.quote: 'Did you know why rare ingredients taste better? This is because humans taste not with their tounges, but their minds' - Sakuya Izayoi.

techs.name: Limitless Learning
techs.quote: Sumireko is cute. Did you expected a Touhou quote or something?

techs.name: Areal Warfare
techs.quote: Touhou Fact: Hina doesn't directly bring misfortune; she absorbs misfortune from her surroundings. It's just that those who get caught in the cross-fire of her absorption get hit with a quick wave of misfortune.

techs.name: Outside World Awareness
techs.quote: The Great Hakurei Barrier is the barrier that hides Gensokyo away from the Outside World, and which allows youkai to survive within even when outside humans no longer believe in them.

techs.quote: It is unknown when, how, or why the mansion was originally constructed, but Remilia Scarlet has been its mistress for about 500 years, and Flandre Scarlet has been in the basement for about 495 years.
